jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Are you excited about data, terabytes of data? How about building products that help analysts and data scientists to do their analyses more effectively, efficiently and impactful? 

Lead a team of engineers to build the world-class data platform that accelerates insight generation and self democratized data environment. Your scope of data platform will be on data governance, which includes data catalog, data protection, data quality, and data lineage.
jobsJson.description:
Are you excited about data, terabytes of data? How about building products that help analysts and data scientists to do their analyses more effectively, efficiently and impactful?

Lead a team of engineers to build the world-class data platform that accelerates insight generation and self democratized data environment. Your scope of data platform will be on data governance, which includes data catalog, data protection, data quality, and data lineage.
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Assess and manage team performance through staff meetings, one on ones, and quarterly assessments
  • Mentor your engineers to ensure their growth and engagement in the team, evaluate team workload and develop a staffing plan, and assign projects and balance workload to ensure continuous delivery and higher predictability
  • Serve as primary interface to staffing team, creating job descriptions, identifying sources for candidates, conducting interviews and shepherding candidates through the process
  • Lead a team of Software Engineers focused on improving analyst velocity and impact across Gojek’s diverse project areas and platforms
  • Become a partner to Product Managers on deciding vision, strategy and OKRs
  • Provide technical expertise throughout the product life cycle including design, implementation, and delivery of scalable build/test/release infrastructure
  • Create the next generation data platform for Gojek, focusing on productivity, testing, and release
  • Collaborate with leadership and key stakeholders on a regular basis

• 3+ years of relevant software development experience preferably with experience in data products, also 2+ years of leading and monitoring an engineering team to success
  • Still hands-on and enjoys writing code every day preferably with experience in Java, Golang, and/or Python
  • Ability to understand and implement Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery
  • Well versed with Agile methodologies, TDD and Test Engineering, and Automation
  • Ability to plan, prioritize, estimate and execute releases with a good degree of predictability
  • Ability to scope, review and refine user stories for technical completeness and to alleviate dependency risks
  • Understanding in data modeling for data warehouse, relational database, and non-relational database
  • Understanding in batch and stream data pipeline. Beam, Flink, Spark
